name: Camel Simulator
description:
Here comes the best Camel Simulator app out there. Explore the desert with your very own desert creature. You are in control of this fun Camel. Each 1000 Points you earn, he will grow. He's super strong and not happy. Smash cars, farm tractors, airplanes, fire hydrants, people, men,women,and anything else not attached to the ground. Like all camels - he can get a little Crazy. Kick some wheels. Help this him grow from a little guy in Level. Smash into giant insects like Ants, Mantis, Spiders, and Scorpions.
#1 to a Giant in Level 25. Race around off the road or on the highway. Battle the snow and rain to complete the missions. This game combines elements of rampage style games with adventure games. Try to rank in the Top 10 in the world with this mind bending sim! Awesome 3D effects! There's even some surprises to be found.
Features:
--Giants Bugs and Scorpions
--Race around the Desert, City, and Countryside Maps
--48 Missions to Complete
-- Snow, Rain, Fire, Huge Explosions
--Combines rampage with adventure
--Excellent 3D graphics and fast gameplay
--Real Time Growth - you will see him getting bigger
--Loaded with awesome special effects!
If you ever wanted to be a Camel, this is your chance. Rampage the city or country farm.
Notes: At this point, level 25 is maximum size - -and by Level 25 he will be so big, he will smash everything quickly. He goes up by 1 Level each 1000 points that is scored. This app works best on newer devices. If you enjoy playing other animal sims like Dinosaur Sim, Shark, Goat, Crocodile, Snake, Wolf, Elephant, or Horse Simulator, you are probably going to love this game. It works best on the most recent devices.
Connect with us @jellyfishgiant
